Posts.Content: I had a mastectomy in 2006 and everything fine now, have just finished taking Letrozole (Femera) - last November adn have been feeling very odd since, headaches and colds and coughs, feeling down etc. Has anyone else had an after effects when stopping this drug, or does anyone know of any research that has taken place. Maybe it is just coinicidental.
Posts.Title: after effects of letrozole
